Text: News In Bloom NewsletterFLOWERSCOM Customer Great news The official FLOWERSCOM newsletter News In Bloom has a whole new look just in time for the holiday season Celebrate with us and get the scoop on special holiday offers seasonal decorating tips recipes gift ideas and more So click on in and see for yourself what all the excitement is about flowersxeasprdecwgaboutnibasp Happy Holidays Your Friends at FLOWERSCOMsm You received this email because you are a FLOWERSCOM customer If you would no longer like to receive our promotional email offers please send an email to from the email address you would like removed If you have additional email addresses on file with us you must send email from those addresses as well or you will continue to receive emails at those addresses Please do not reply to this message Due to timing issues you may potentially receive a future message before your unsubscribe request is implemented For questions about an order or any other issues please email us at The FLOWERSCOM privacy policy is available online at flowerssecurityindexaspprivacy

News in Bloomin Bloom An Official FLOWERSCOM Newsletter November Welcome to News in Bloom the official monthly newsletter of FLOWERSCOM This is our way of keeping loyal customers like you up to date with hot deals on our gifting collections new additions to the FLOWERSCOM family and ideas on how to decorate your home with seasonal decorations and floral arrangements As we welcome Thanksgiving this month we have lots of terrific gifts to Complete the Feast Please browse our newsletter to see all we have to offer Ideas in Season Share this Thanksgiving with a faraway friend relative or someone special you are thinking of with a great gift or floral arrangement from our Thanksgiving Collection The perfect way to be part of the holiday when you cant be there in person cgibinfcollectionplwtgnb Whats New SPECIAL ANNOUNCEMENT We are happy to announce our association with Americas leading producer of fine chinaLenox gifts that celebrate life The impeccable quality of Lenox giftware brings further prestige to our growing selection of gifting items And for you that means its easier than ever to find just the right gift for any occasion Be sure to visit our new Lenox Specialty Boutique today flowersxeasprwlxnbgwelcomeaspsection Hot Offers Share something delicious even if you cant be there for the big meal Receive off when you select a delectable gift from our specially selected GREATFOODCOM off collection Be sure to use promotion code THX at checkout to receive your discount GREATFOODCOM gourmet gifting made great flowersxtquickasprwgfmcs Whats the Buzz Decorate the Thanksgiving tables of family and friends and send our breathtaking Thanksgiving Centerpiece Its a great gift to give when you cant be there for the big holiday dinner Along with our centerpiece youll find wonderful desserts and gourmet treats for Thanksgiving at our Thanksgiving Gift Center flowersxeasprwtgcnbggifthindexasp Dont Forget Look for our November Gift Guide arriving in your mailbox November th Andgobble gobble Thanksgiving is Thursday November rd Stop by your local FLOWERS shop for the perfect gift to present to your Host or Hostess or if youre missing that special something to complete your own Thanksgiving feast flowersxeasprwhpnbgstoreslocatorasp Happy Thanksgiving Your Friends at FLOWERSCOM Visit us We have the perfect gift for anniversaries birthdays or just because Visit us at Bookmark us To start shopping any time for any occasion bookmark our site at keyword flowers or FLOWERSCOM at cgibinfenterstoreplbookmk For Your Protection You can view our privacy statement online at flowerssecurityindexaspprivacy To Unsubscribe Your subscription to this newsletter is free We dont want to lose you especially with so much fun coming during Holiday but to unsubscribe please change your preferences on your Registration Form at flowersxeasprrgmlgmyshopindexasp Exclusive of applicable service and shipping charges and taxes Items may vary and are subject to availability delivery rules and times Items available online and by phone Offers cannot be combined and are not available on all products and are subject to restrictions and blackout periods Offer valid through Void where prohibited FLOWERSCOMINC
